Description:
The candidate should be able to generate leads or/and call a specific list of customers and update the CRM daily.
In each call, the candidate should present the product/service online or attend a physical meeting if needed.
A commission up to 15% will be calculated from each deal closed by the candidate.
A penalty of up to zero salary in case of not signing with any leads/clients.Skills
Skills:
Communication skills
Presentation skills
Negotiations skills
Software & Applications skills is preferable.
